comment.caption: M31- Andromeda Galaxy
comment.note:
M31, also known as the Andromeda Galaxy. This galaxy is the nearest spiral galaxy to our own, and can be seen with the naked eye in the constellation Andromeda. It is of classification Sb. The fuzzy orb below center is M32, and elliptical galaxy orbitting M31. North is up and East to the left.
Atik 383L CCD on the Meade 80 mm APO provides about a 2-degree vertical field of view.
